Write a Dockerfile object to a dockerfile

Source: R/Class-Dockerfile.R
write-Dockerfile-method.Rd

Write a Dockerfile object to a dockerfile

# S4 method for Dockerfile
write(x, file = file.path(getwd(), "Dockerfile"))

Arguments

x

Dockerfile object to be serialized
file

optional argument specifying a costum file path

Examples

# write a dockerfile with default parameters to temporary file and show content:
temp = tempfile()
write(dockerfile(), file=temp)
#> INFO [2019-08-20 16:44:09] Going online? TRUE  ... to retrieve system dependencies (sysreq-api)
